title: League Start Up Glitch?
body:
So when my client starts up it says "We have restored this installation to an older version  of League of Legends. Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version." but then it'll say "There was a problem patching League of Legends. We'll restore a back up version and try up dating again after restarting you restart the patcher." but when it restarts it just says the same thing and keeps looping. 

Anyone know how to fix this problem?

replies.body:
Hi there,

Can you please try and right click on your League Of Legends and ensure that full screen optimisation is disabled. Also, make sure you're running League with admin rights :D. 

Cheers
Swhyper

I'm having the EXACT same issue... I ensured my firewall was as open as it could be on the lines regarding league of legends. I can't even download the hextool repair program from the LoL website either (the webpage just is continuesly loading something).
